related_questions.question: Change the sentences into negative and interrogative a. my mother always give mea a present for my birthday b. he knew the answer off the question c. rudi and anto arema playing badminton now

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. - My mother never gives me a present for my birthday?

? Does your mother give you a present for your birthday?

2. - He didn't know the answer of the question

? Did he know the answer of the question?

3. - Rudi and Anto are not playing badminton now

? Are they playing badminton now?

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^

Text for nomber 8-11
My name is Raditia. I went to BorobudurTemple last weekend. I went there with my
classmates and teachers. We went there by bus.It was a program of my school to learn
Indonesia history.
I was so amazed seeing the temple. It's so wonderful. It's Hindu-Buddhist temple. It's was
built in nith century by Sailendra dynasty. My friends and I really noticed our guide who told
about the history of th temple. The guide ,Mr Tom explained evey single thing about the temple
very clearly and detail. I also took several pictures in the temple.Beside I get knowledgeabout
Borobudur temple.I enjoy the view.It's was my that I will never forget.

a.
b.

related_questions.question:

Oh my God, it's a Persian kitten. She is so cute,
Sarah
: Yes, I like her big eyes and chubby cheeks. Look at her legs, they are short!
Fia : I love her snub nose the most!

A. Dog
D. Cat
C. Rabbit
B. Bird

A small eyes
B. short legs
C. long nose
D. flat chee!

A. gloomy
B.calm
C.mad
D.glad​

answers.answer:

5. D. Cat

7. D. Glad

related_questions.question:
Mrs. Retno is my Biology techer. She is good techer.    She likes teching very much. Mrs. Terno is rather tall
(tinggi). She is abourt 165 cm. Her skin (kulitnya) is light
and she has wavy hair (keriting). Mr. Heru is a Math teacher.
he is fat (gemuk) and short. His skin is dark brown. He looks
very fierce (galak) but actually be is very good teacher, most
of the students like him.
a.
24. How many people are there in the text?
a. 2
b. 3
c. 4
d. 1
25. Does mrs. Retno have a light or black skin?
a. Yes, she does
c. Light skin
b. No, she doesn't d. Black skin
26. Who teaches (mengajar) Math?
Mr. Heru does
c. Mrs. Retno does
b. The writer does
d. The reader does
27. Who teaches Biology ?
a. The reader does c. Mrs. Retno does
b. Mr. Heru does
d. The writer does

a. Monday
c. Wednesday
b. Tuesday
d. Saturday​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

24. A. 2

25. C. light skin

26. A. Mr. Heru does

27. C. Mrs. Retno does

28. B. Tuesday

semoga terbantu, maap kalo salah. Kalo bener jangan lupa jadiin jawaban tercerdas yak✌

Jawaban:

24. B.3

25. B.She doesn't

26. A.Mr Heru does

27. C. Mrs Retno does

24. Mrs.Retno, Mrs.Terno, Mr. Heru

25. The one with the light skin is Mrs. Terno

Tommorow : Monday

After tommorow : Tuesday
